name: Douglas Consulting
overview: Douglas Consulting was established, in the United Kingdom, when computer technology actually became useful and accessible to a large majority of users, our then small client base quickly recognized our abilities to build lasting systems that met their exact specifications. For today, company is on the market for over 30 years. During this time we successfully deliver custom software applications, most of them in the medical and life insurance and document management domains which are popular and well known on the market. Our now diverse client base continues a relationship with us as their business needs change. We have consistently delivered the latest technology and have built systems that last, which give our customers a strong value for their money and overall product satisfaction. Whether we are updating current software systems or implementing new features, we are able to provide a complete range of system implementation services to our clients. Our form of project management with effective interaction between clients and developers often allows us to exceed expectations and allows for introduction to concepts some clients were previously unaware of. Our team of experts will revolutionize the way your business systems speak o each other with intelligent process solutions and innovative technology advancements providing greater flexibility to your mobile and end-users. We can create anything you need in custom programming. Whether it is a new software system or update to your current systems â€“ Douglas Consulting has a comprehensive project management team. Our high skilled Project Management team can work with you to ensure the smoothest completion of your optimal software system. Tim Driscoll, Assistant Vice-President, IS, Hooper Holmes Inc., said about Vice President of Business Development Brenda McIntyre: â€œBrenda is a complete professional and one of the best managers I have come across. She is meticulous with detail and has high interpersonal skills. I have seen her be successful in complex situations dealing with constant change. She has the ability to positively influence outcomes with either her staff or with people with whom she as no direct authority. She develops strong relationships with staff, management, and both external and internal customers. Brenda is a valuable member of any team and a significant contributor to any project.â€ Douglas Consulting also is a pioneer of process-optimizing approaches; it started exploring software outsourcing many years ago, and then, after careful screening and selection built a dedicated center of excellence in Europe. The company always follows the most innovative approaches and utilizes cutting-edge technologies; its solutions are already working on the cloud serving yet more businesses.
